name: SUPER COLLIDER
description:
After a failed particle accelerator experiment turned you into an irradiated mutant, all you want now is to absorb enough living matter so as to reach critical mass and explode, thereby ending your suffering and taking the entire research facility with you.

A and D = move

W = jump

SPACE = detonate (when you reach critical mass)

Frankly, this is a little janky (the energy and pain meters are a little temperamental, and the scenery graphics are, well, unfinished) but it works! Go blow yourself up!

Made for https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-90 which had the theme 'radioactivity'.

All music/graphics/etc by Atomic Toilet. Wheeeeeeeeeeeeeee!
